Title: Wanderer (I)
Writer: Saigopal (script coordinator), Trivikram Srinivas (dialogue), Trivikram Srinivas (screenplay), Trivikram Srinivas (story), Trivikram Srinivas
Actors: Allu Arjun, Ileana D'Cruz, Rajendraprasad, Sonu Sood
Plot: A happy go lucky man with a razor sharp intelligence foils a gangster's plan of robbing a bank. A violent battle of egos ensues as the latter tries to seek revenge.
